TitleEnglish: Hanaori-san Still Wants to Fight in the Next Life
SummaryEnglish: The story follows RyÅ«sei Narukami, a shut-in who spends his days playing games, but who had once been a Demon King in another world. It also follows Meteor Hanaori, the former hero who defeated him and is now a high school girl.
Aliases: Hanaori-san wa Tensei Shite mo Kenka ga Shitai
Hanaori-san Wants to Have a Fight Even if She Reincarnates
